main.title: Hyeongjun Huh_
main.FooterDesc: This is the personal portfolio of software developer Hyeongjun Huh. The code on the site is at the following link.

frontendProject.title: Frontend Developer
frontendProject.description: Making visible software. Exploring cutting edge web technologies used on the frontend such as 3D mini-games using ThreeJS, WebRTC real-time communication, and JS-based ML. Above all, it's my main area of technology.

archery.title: Archery
archery.description: A Three JS based archery game. The UI part was developed by React and TypeScript.

nugget.title: Nugget
nugget.description: A video editing software using Custom Elements, Electron, and FFmpeg.

lightsaber.title: VR LightSaber
lightsaber.description: A VR lightsaber game that you enjoy on the web.

maskers.title: Maskers
maskers.description: Virtual YouTuber platform on the web environment.

backendProject.title: Backend Developer
backendProject.description: NodeJS Express. I'm focused on designing for scalable and robust servers when I'm developing them.

writer.title: Writer
writer.description: Writing in Korean on several blog platforms. I usually share technical columns, personal essays, etc. And I'm excited to share the knowledge I've learned with others. *I recommend you turn on the Google translator

informationSecurity.title: Information security
informationSecurity.description: My area of interest. I mainly solve wargames related to web hacking and encryption.

moreLink.title: Visit My Website
moreLink.description: You can find me on the internet!

hackathon.title: Hackathoner
hackathon.description: I participated in 3 hackathons. I enjoy the challenging in the Hackathon and love that powerful ambience
